entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
